npm install @lighthouse-web3/sdk
npx hardhat verify --network pepe_unchained_v2_testnet 0x638597d20efd34C5f9276812C71C3D0077c161bd 0x62942BbBb86482bFA0C064d0262E23Ca04ea99C5 1000000
npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network pepe_unchained_v2_testnet
npx hardhat run scripts/set-partner.js --network pepe_unchained_v2_testnet
